message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $110. I think it would be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $95. Let me know if this works for you.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go below $105.  This product is in high demand, and I'm confident in its value.
Hello Alice, I've considered your offer and I'm still not able to go above $100 for the product. I hope this aligns with your valuation.
